file_content.text: Still sorry, yes? Still very sorry for Anchorhead.
Recalling all droids now. No more trouble!
There are droids stealing holocams from Anchorhead. I traced their control signal here.
Here? No droids here. No holocams! You go!
Tk. Holocams slightly here. Give for free--trade gift! Broken droids yours, too. All forgiven. Yes?
I'm not the one you need to talk to. You need to go to Anchorhead and confess.
But--stupid! Tk. Can do this for clan.
Will take everything stolen and go. Not happy.
Yes! Understand very good. Never more droids, never more taking anything!
Very much thankful. No more troubles.
No! You right! Very sorry--we leave city, never trouble. Send tribute, maybe?
Clan will punish me. Do not hurt other clan Jawas. Very sorry...
No trade now! Go, please! Very busy.
